sent.orig: All all cannot get rid of the fetter, gets rid of the control.
sent.trans: 所有的一切都不能摆脱束缚，摆脱控制。

sent.orig: How can I get rid of the flies in the kitchen?
sent.trans: 我怎样才能消灭厨房里的苍蝇？

sent.orig: The more the boss tries to get rid of her, the more she digs in.
sent.trans: 老板越是想开除她，她就越是拼命保住自己的地位。

sent.orig: I can't get rid of this cold.
They must rid themselves of the bad habits and ideas acquired in the old society.
sent.trans: 他们必须去掉这些在旧社会养成的旧习惯、旧思想。
